title: Cancellara’s Tudor Pro Cycling Project Hails ‘Great Recognition’ of Giro d’Italia Wildcard
content:
Swiss squad joins Israel Premier Tech, Polti Kometa, Bardiani CSF-Faizane as invited teams to 2024 race, Lotto-Dstny turns down call-up.

Read the full article at Cancellara’s Tudor Pro Cycling Project Hails ‘Great Recognition’ of Giro d’Italia Wildcard on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
